high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.utils

Class Conversion

  • java.lang.Object
    • high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.utils.Conversion

  • public final class Conversion
extends java.lang.Object
    An instance of this class describes either an as-conversion or an is-conversion.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean cast
      This flag is true, if this conversion is really a cast.
      java.lang.String name
      This is the name of the conversion method, if the conversion is predefined.
      IReturnType type
      This is the type of values that the conversion method returns.
      IExpressionType value
      This is the type of value that the conversion method takes as input.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Conversion(java.lang.String name, IExpressionType value, IReturnType type, boolean cast)
      Sole Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Conversion findConversion(TypeSystem typesystem, IExpressionType value, IReturnType type)
      This method creates a description of a conversion between two types.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • name

        public final java.lang.String name
        This is the name of the conversion method, if the conversion is predefined.

      • value

        public final IExpressionType value
        This is the type of value that the conversion method takes as input. If this conversion is really a cast, then this is the type of the object being cast.

      • type

        public final IReturnType type
        This is the type of values that the conversion method returns. If this conversion is really a cast, then this is the type that the object is being cast to.

      • cast

        public final boolean cast
        This flag is true, if this conversion is really a cast.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Conversion

        public Conversion(java.lang.String name,
          IExpressionType value,
          IReturnType type,
          boolean cast)
        Sole Constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the conversion method.
        value - is the input type of the conversion.
        type - is the output type of the conversion.
        cast - is true, iff this conversion is really a cast.

    • Method Detail

      • findConversion

        public static Conversion findConversion(TypeSystem typesystem,
                        IExpressionType value,
                        IReturnType type)
        This method creates a description of a conversion between two types.
        Parameters:
        typesystem - is the type-system containing the types.
        value - is the type of the conversion's input.
        type - is the type of the conversion's output.
        Returns:
        an object that describes the conversion; or null, if the conversion is impossible.
